00057 l4util_in16(l4_uint16_t port);

00066 l4util_in32(l4_uint16_t port);

00168 /*****************************************************************************
00169  *** Implementation
00170  *****************************************************************************/
00171 
00172 L4_INLINE l4_uint8_t
00173 l4util_in8(l4_uint16_t port)
00174 {
00175   l4_uint8_t value;
00176   asm volatile ("inb %w1, %b0" : "=a" (value) : "Nd" (port));
00177   return value;
00178 }
00179 
00180 L4_INLINE l4_uint16_t
00181 l4util_in16(l4_uint16_t port)
00182 {
00183   l4_uint16_t value;
00184   asm volatile ("inw %w1, %w0" : "=a" (value) : "Nd" (port));
00185   return value;
00186 }
00187 
00188 L4_INLINE l4_uint32_t
00189 l4util_in32(l4_uint16_t port)
00190 {
00191   l4_uint32_t value;
00192   asm volatile ("inl %w1, %0" : "=a" (value) : "Nd" (port));
00193   return value;
00194 }
00195 
00196 L4_INLINE void
00197 l4util_ins8(l4_uint16_t port, l4_umword_t addr, l4_umword_t count)
00198 {
00199   l4_umword_t dummy1, dummy2;
00200   asm volatile ("rep insb" : "=D"(dummy1), "=c"(dummy2)
00201          : "d" (port), "D" (addr), "c"(count)
00202          : "memory");
00203 }
00204 
00205 L4_INLINE void
00206 l4util_ins16(l4_uint16_t port, l4_umword_t addr, l4_umword_t count)
00207 {
00208   l4_umword_t dummy1, dummy2;
00209   asm volatile ("rep insw" : "=D"(dummy1), "=c"(dummy2)
00210          : "d" (port), "D" (addr), "c"(count)
00211          : "memory");
00212 }
00213 
00214 L4_INLINE void
00215 l4util_ins32(l4_uint16_t port, l4_umword_t addr, l4_umword_t count)
00216 {
00217   l4_umword_t dummy1, dummy2;
00218   asm volatile ("rep insl" : "=D"(dummy1), "=c"(dummy2)
00219          : "d" (port), "D" (addr), "c"(count)
00220          : "memory");
00221 }
00222 
00223 L4_INLINE void
00224 l4util_out8(l4_uint8_t value, l4_uint16_t port)
00225 {
00226   asm volatile ("outb %b0, %w1" : : "a" (value), "Nd" (port));
00227 }
00228 
00229 L4_INLINE void
00230 l4util_out16(l4_uint16_t value, l4_uint16_t port)
00231 {
00232   asm volatile ("outw %w0, %w1" : : "a" (value), "Nd" (port));
00233 }
00234 
00235 L4_INLINE void
00236 l4util_out32(l4_uint32_t value, l4_uint16_t port)
00237 {
00238   asm volatile ("outl %0, %w1" : : "a" (value), "Nd" (port));
00239 }
00240 
00241 L4_INLINE void
00242 l4util_outs8(l4_uint16_t port, l4_umword_t addr, l4_umword_t count)
00243 {
00244   l4_umword_t dummy1, dummy2;
00245   asm volatile ("rep outsb" : "=S"(dummy1), "=c"(dummy2)
00246           : "d" (port), "S" (addr), "c"(count)
00247           : "memory");
00248 }
00249 
00250 L4_INLINE void
00251 l4util_outs16(l4_uint16_t port, l4_umword_t addr, l4_umword_t count)
00252 {
00253   l4_umword_t dummy1, dummy2;
00254   asm volatile ("rep outsw" : "=S"(dummy1), "=c"(dummy2)
00255           : "d" (port), "S" (addr), "c"(count)
00256           : "memory");
00257 }
00258 
00259 L4_INLINE void
00260 l4util_outs32(l4_uint16_t port, l4_umword_t addr, l4_umword_t count)
00261 {
00262   l4_umword_t dummy1, dummy2;
00263   asm volatile ("rep outsl" : "=S"(dummy1), "=c"(dummy2)
00264           : "d" (port), "S" (addr), "c"(count)
00265           : "memory");
00266 }
00267 
00268 L4_INLINE void
00269 l4util_iodelay(void)
00270 {
00271   asm volatile ("outb %al,$0x80");
00272 }
00273 
00274 #endif
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
